sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ModalController } from '@ionic/angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-event-modal', templateUrl: './event-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./event-modal.component.scss'], }) export class EventModalComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private modalController: ModalController) { } ngOnInit() {} card: any; dismiss() { this.modalController.dismiss(); } } {{card.title}} {{card.title}} {{card.extendedDescription}} {{card.location}} Location {{card.pax}} Pax Close Modal
